name: Python Basics for Programming: From Foundations to Practice
courseware: Python Fundamentals: Syntax Essentials, Data Types, Control Flow, Functions, and Modular Programming
assessment: Online quizzes, coding assignments, and a final project.
sampleProject: Build a CLI tool for data processing and analysis

name: Web Development Basics: Core Fundamentals
courseware: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, responsive design, and web accessibility.
assessment: Hands-On Web Development Journey:Real-World Development TasksPeer Code Reviews & Optimization Capstone Portfolio Showcase.
sampleProject: Build a responsive personal portfolio website with interactive elements.

name: Foundations of Database Management
courseware: Relational database design, SQL, normalization, and database administration.
assessment: Database design exercises, SQL query tasks, and a database implementation project.
sampleProject: Database Development Project: Requirements analysis for [Business Type] ER diagram design & normalization SQL schema implementation Data population & validation scripts.

name: NIntroduction to Network Security Essentials
courseware: Network protocols, cybersecurity principles, ethical hacking, and security tools.
assessment: Security lab exercises, penetration testing simulations, and case studies.
sampleProject: Conduct a security assessment of a simulated network environment.

name: Data-Driven Decision Making through Analytics
courseware: Data visualization, machine learning basics, Python libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn).
assessment: Data analysis projects, predictive modeling tasks, and presentation of findings.
sampleProject: Analyze a real-world dataset and develop a machine learning model to predict outcomes.
